text:
HENRY SHACKLETON: So
in this classroom,

we had sort of a flipped
format where before every lab

you'd go through questions
online, watch presentation

And I think that really helped
because lab classes sort

of inherently when you're
doing the analysis,

doing all the data collection,
they're very independent.

So you don't have a professor
telling you do this, do that.

You're on your own doing
this data collection.

And the fact that
the pre-lab, sort

of going through and
learning the stuff,
you do that by yourself as well.

You sort of independently
learn all this stuff

and research by yourself and
find out things by yourself.

That sort of helps to lead you
into the ultimate data analysis

and making a presentation by
yourself and doing all of this
